author: aching
msg: [Bug 4180317] ZooKeeper will shutdown when the job fails. [aching]

author: aching
msg: Implemented the TestPageRankVertex (from Pregel paper).  Implemented getTotalVertices(), size() from OutEdgeIterator as convenience

author: aching
msg: Changed edges to have both an edgeValue and a destination vertex (new).  Added new Interface OutEdgeIterator to iterate
over the edges.  Cleaned up all warnings in all java files. Changed VertexReader to take edge maps (destination vertex id,

author: aching
msg: Main change is integrated the messaging support and tested it in TestMsgVertex.  Renamed TestSuperStepOnlyVertex ->
TestSuperStepVertex.  Changed the I, V types to be mutable.  Integrated the the RPCCommunications directly into the
infrastructure.  Fixed bug of masterCleanup() waiting forever on a child node that didn't exist.  Added new
getVertexMessageIterator() to CommunicationsInterface and implemented in RPCCommmunications.  Partitions must implement
Writable.  Fixed the compute() interface to give the message iterator. [aching].

author: aching
msg: Fixed a bug in the childrenList being used when it was null.
